Release dates:
July14,2022 ( 2022-07-14 )  ( Tribeca Film Festival ) 
 July22,2022 ( 2022-07-22 )  (United States)
Production: Katie Holmes wrote the film at the very beginning of lockdown in 2020. Alone Together, produced by her new production company called Lafayette Pictures, is her second film as director. She produced the film with Jordan Yale Levine, Jordan Beckerman and Jesse Korman of Yale Productions, and Shaun Sanghani, owner of SSS Entertainment.
Release: The film had its world premiere at the Tribeca Film Festival on July 14, 2022. Vertical Entertainment acquired North American distribution rights. The film was theatrically released on July 22, 2022 and was released on video on demand on July 29, 2022.
Reception: Review aggregator Rotten Tomatoes reports that 30% of 37 critics gave the film a positive review, for an average rating of 4.70 out of 10. The site's critics consensus reads: "Director Katie Holmes takes an appealingly low-key approach to her story, but it isn't enough to offset Alone Together's bland characters and overall predictability."
